pageContext.claim: “[Democrats] have blocked every effort to close deadly loopholes, to keep out vicious criminals, and to stop the flow of illegal immigrants and drugs. They are a disaster at the border.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump may believe the laws are "the world's worst," but Trump is mistaken — the U.S. has some of the most restrictive immigration laws. Plus, much of current immigration policy was decided either under a Republican president or through court cases and Democrats have offered at least four immigration deals that included funding for more border security.
